title: Hip-Hop, Mass Incarceration, And A Conspiracy Theory For The Ages
description: Why are hip-hop and mass incarceration so entangled in the U.S.? That's the question that our play cousins at NPR Music, Sidney Madden and Rodney Carmichael, set out to answer on their brand new podcast, Louder Than a Riot.
